PMDA·1 | Nicol Bolas | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you pay {U}{B}{R}.

trans-unit.resname: PMDA·1 | Nicol Bolas | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to an opponent, that player discards their hand.

trans-unit.source: ニコル・ボーラスは手下と犠牲者を区別しない。
trans-unit.target: ニコル・ボーラスは手下と犠牲者を区別しない。

trans-unit.resname: PMDA·2 | Pouncing Jaguar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
trans-unit.target: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
